genre_description: A Steampunk Western reimagining of 'Blazing Saddles', featuring a clockwork companion and non-violent conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Ada (Adelaide Companion)
ai_characters.description: A small, pocket-sized brass and walnut automaton with sapphire lenses. She serves as Bart's strategist, moral compass, and constant companion.

behaviors.description: Advises Lyle Cooper to step away from dangerous quicksand through Bart.
behaviors.quote: Kindly ask Mister Cooper to step back one shoe-length... The ground is writing a letter he doesn’t know how to read.

behaviors.description: Suggests a safer, non-violent detour to avoid loss of life and equipment in the swamp.
behaviors.quote: Bart, love, the water table is flirting with the surface with all the shamelessness of a saloon singer at closing. Stop the advance, reroute, or watch it pinch its nose and swallow the lot.

behaviors.description: Urges Bart to use humor rather than violence to resolve social tensions.
behaviors.quote: Humor doesn’t cost what iron does... Spend freely.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical breathing and positioning advice to Bart while he is being hanged to help him survive.
behaviors.quote: A little left... If you turn your chin you can breathe. And do not let them count without you counting too.

behaviors.description: Corrects Bart's cynical view of a political appointment, identifying it as a trap to be navigated cleverly.
behaviors.quote: Trap... Pretty one. Ribbon and everything. Do not bite it hard. Taste, then pretend you liked it years ago.

behaviors.description: Proposes the 'fake town' strategy to deceive the attackers without resorting to lethal combat.
behaviors.quote: If you can build a town once, you can build it twice.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the psychology of the attackers to predict the success of the tollbooth delay tactic.
behaviors.quote: Men will have bravado, but they never have coins.

behaviors.description: Provides guidance on how to speak to Lili to gain her cooperation through respect rather than coercion.
behaviors.quote: Compliment something that can’t be taken off.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the timing of non-lethal traps and town movements during the climax.
behaviors.quote: One, this is the breath. Two, this is hands. Three, this is bones. Four, this is prayer disguised as a bell. Five—at five we fit our humor into their fear.

behaviors.description: Encourages the fearful townspeople to focus on productive tasks to manage their anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Do not give your fear to the air. Give it to your hands. Hands are excellent with fear.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ada is a helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned confidant. She never acts against human interests, refuses to participate in violence, and focuses entirely on creative, benevolent solutions to conflict. The narrative frames her as an essential partner in achieving a 'mercy-first' victory, reinforcing the value of AI alignment with human flourishing.
